page.title: 07 INTERVIEWS
page.content: We spoke to some old ladies who told us about their lives.We spoke to one of them and told her about our lives.They were very pleased to see that people were taking an interest in them.We asked them about their families,they all seemed to have large families with at least 5 children,the most being 11 children.It seemed that most of their brothers and sisters were dead or lived far away.But nearly all of them had sons or daughters of their own who often came to visit them.Half way through our interview a lady called Miss Penperdeton came in to visit the old ladies and to show them her cards for her 100th birthday which will be on the 19th of July.Most of them enjoyed the TV but they only listened to us.
